entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] ScrollView not updating size when content size changes #15374
  • BlazorWebView.HostPage does not support URI pack notation #15373
  • while downloading Android emulator , "The operation has timed out." is showing. #15372
  • ICanvas DrawString does not work on MacCatalyst platform #15370
  • Blue window background in maui application #15366
  • MAUI Blazor Hybrid does not respect device language on iOS for datetime #15364
  • Border size changes appear to be animated on iOS/MacCatalyst #15363
  • Android dynamic theme change not working without styles.xaml file #15359
  • Switch Animation breaks on NavigationPage change #15358
  • IsVisible binding not showing items again if Shadow is set #15357
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged event only raises once #15350
  • White screen #15347

Closed

  • [M1] 7.0 Maui Blazor app displays blank on iOS 16.2 simulator. #13077
  • @jfversluis, @aokocax and @Dreamescaper - for now we got it to work here for a Maui-Blazor app with Android/Firebase by including the following libraries: #15369
  • Unable to debug MAUI app on Android with latest preview version #15329
  • Border in ScrollView will flicker when scroll on Android #9805
    Backlog
  • [MAC] Horizontal Options of child inside absolute layout is not working with "RightToLeft' flow direction #9970
    Backlog
  • CarouselView not displaying EmptyView when Loop is disabled #10056
    Backlog
  • [Android] Sign APK in release mode #15323
    Backlog
  • Winform BlazorWebView: Unable to open multiple Winform windows with BlazorWebView content #15308
  • RadioButton rendered incorrectly in MacCatalyst #15214

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.01xx-preview5] Latest changes from the net8 branch #15378
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Add insertion back #15377
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15376
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5] [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15375
  • [net8.0] Bump tizen to preview5 #15368
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main again #15367
  • [CI] Remove template explosion on the maui templates build tests. #15365
  • [net7.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15361
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Run security compliance only on private build #15356
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove netstandard2.1 #15355
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge
  • Bump Xamarin.UITest from 4.1.3 to 4.1.4 #15354
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [net8.0] Add insertion back #15352
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15360
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix UItests scripts #15353
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview5 ] Update stable version of net7 #15351
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net6.0] Run security compliance only on private build #15362
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge net8 3 #15337
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [CI] Remove the template explosion in the CI via a matrix #15340
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Scrollview on Windows doesn't measure direct child on height changed #15248
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fixed removing items from the shell causing a crash #15098
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Android] Fix IsEnabled property on Android SearchBar #14616
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Add AppThemeColor #8839
    community ✨, area/theme
  • Style specificity #13818
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add some tests for changing the app version properties #15338
  • [Windows/macOS] Implement menu key accelerators #14740
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, control-menubar
  • [macOS] Implement IsEnabled property in MenuFlyoutItems #14920
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-contextmenu
  • [Android] Fix Border RoundRectangle CornerRadius issue #14995
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Android] Fix SwipeView not swiping using Label as direct content #14824
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Allow to customize the Shell FlyoutIcon #14663
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [X] Optimize OnPlatform element syntax #5611
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 8 Planning
  • Ensure "text boxes" preserve cursor location #15099
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Formalize virtual layout concepts and fix iOS memory leaks #15303
